title: Redundancy Cleanup
description: Based on the analysis from 2025-11-12, there are numerous redundant files (e.g., files ending in ' 2.md'). This task is to identify, review, and delete these unnecessary files to restore a single source of truth.
acceptance_criteria: All files ending with ' 2.md' have been reviewed.
The root cause of file duplication is investigated and documented.
notes: This is a critical first step to reduce clutter and confusion in the repository.
